## Documentation Issue

Which part of the documentation needs improvement?

## Current Documentation

What does the current documentation say (or not say)?

## Suggested Improvement

How would you improve it? Please be specific.

````markdown
<!-- Example of improved documentation -->

## New Section Title

Improved explanation here...

```php
// Improved code example
test('better example', function () {
    // ...
});
```
````

```

## Why This Matters
How would this improvement help users?

## Location
Where is this documentation located?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] Examples/stubs
- [ ] Other:

## Additional Context
Any other context about the documentation improvement.

```
